name: Biff & Buckaroo
description:
==ATTENTION==
This game has inspired me to make a more polished version, so that will hopefully coming out! This game also has no end, as I have been rather busy with other matters (and I also suck at making good puzzles)

Biff is tall, and Buckaroo is short. They're in a world of confusion and puzzles, will they make it?
